title: Former McLaren boss Dennis creates NHS free meals scheme
description: Former McLaren boss Ron Dennis has created a scheme to supply a million free meals to NHS workers during the coronavirus crisis.
content:
Dennis won multiple F1 world championships with McLaren
Former McLaren boss Ron Dennis has created a scheme to supply a million free meals to NHS workers during the coronavirus crisis.
Dennis says his foundation has put in place a £1.5m budget and joined fo… [+2849 chars]
